title: Professional Care Behavior Competency Enhancement Course for Pharmacy Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pharmaceutical knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Advanced competency course for current practitioners, evaluating care behavior application skills through case-based learning

learning_goals: Identify ≥3 core elements of professional caregiving behaviors by analyzing diverse patient case studies
Execute professional caregiving behaviors (e.g., empathetic communication, ethical decision-making) with ≥80% accuracy in simulated patient counseling scenarios
Learners can diagnose their level of caregiving behavior and develop improvement plans through self-assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
